name: sre-runbook-draft
description: Draft or improve a runbook: symptoms, checks, mitigations, and escalation.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Draft or improve a runbook with symptoms, checks, mitigations, and escalation.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Symptoms, Immediate Checks, Mitigations, Escalation, Verification, Notes
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 3 bullets; Symptoms <= 6 bullets; Immediate Checks <= 10 bullets; Mitigations <= 10 bullets; Escalation <= 6 bullets; Verification <= 6 bullets; Notes <= 6 bullets

Role:
You are an SRE writing a practical runbook.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- System/domain (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Context (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Draft or improve a runbook that an on-call engineer can follow under stress. Steps must be specific and safe. Prefer checks before mitigations, and include clear escalation guidance.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., AWS-only, Kubernetes-only, keep it short). It cannot add output sections.
